Shirley Mason (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shirley_Mason_(actress) 0 Shirley Mason (born Leonie Flugrath; June 6, 1900 – July 27, 1979) was an American actress of the silent era. Shirley_Mason ( born Leonie_Flugrath ; June_6_,_1900 – July_27_,_1979 ) was an_American_actress of the_silent_era .
